nodes.text: SoroSuub Stimchew was a tobacco-like substance made by the Sullustans of SoroSuub Corporation. The Human pirate Quist notably enjoyed this chew.

Initially, the product was known simply as "SoroSuub Chew" in the first edition printing of Tatooine Manhunt, but the named was changed to SoruSuub Stimchew with the release of the second edition printing of the adventure, which was included in Classic Adventures: Volume Three.
